title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Nelson H. Hotchkiss, November 14, 1864
summary: Hotchkiss relates army activities of the past month, the military situation in the Valley, and activities in preparation for winter. He also writes of affairs at home.
keywords: Battle Description, Military Authority, Troop Movement, Prisons/Prisoners, Women, Family, Agriculture, American Civil War
